content.value:
1. Protecting Your Information. The personal customer information you provide, including your credit card information, to establish an account with us and to make purchases from us is secured using secured socket layer (SSL) encryption technology. We use this SSL technology to prevent such information from being intercepted and randomly transmitted over the Internet. The encrypted data goes to a secure site where your information is stored on restricted-access computers located at restricted-access sites.

  2. Password Security. To further secure your personal, customer information, we require you to create a customer password when you establish an account with us. We encourage you to keep a password that is not easily guessed (i.e., don't use your name or street name). Keep your password secret; do not share it with anyone.

    If you forget your password, you can retrieve it by using the account login page (enter your personal login informaton and choose: Please Email Me My Password), and we will send you your password. It will be sent to the e-mail address that you entered when you established your MiracleSoap.com account. If you want to change your password or other account information, simply click on account login page and enter your personal login information and password, click login. On the next page, click Account. If you changed your password, enter your new password, confirm your new password, and click save. If changing other information, simply enter the information you wish to change and click save. You may change your password and other account information at the same time. Just remember to click save after you have changed your password, confirmed your new password and changed any other account information. If your email address has changed and you have lost your password please email us at: security@miraclesoap.com and we will verify your account by contacting you by the phone number you provided in the email which needs to match the account information you originaly provided. If you prefer you can create a new account here: account login page

  3. Remember to Sign Out. To further prevent unauthorized access to your account, remember that after you sign in, you should sign out once you have (1) completed managing your account, or (2) decided to step away from your computer. Anyone who accesses your computer after you have signed in but before you have signed out, can access your account. If you sign in, and follow thru with a purchase on the website, the system will automatically log you out once your order is completed and you are shown the invoice / receipt page.

  4. Laws Relating to Credit Card Usage. Under federal law, a credit card issuer cannot make you liable for charges in excess of $50 that result from the unauthorized use of your credit card. There are similar federal laws that relate to debit cards. Exceptions do apply, and you will have to comply with the rules of your credit or debit card issuer, so please contact your card issuer for further details.

  5. Alternative Customer Purchasing Options. If you do not feel comfortable sending your credit card information to us over the Internet, you still can shop with us. We welcome you to call us and complete your purchase by phone. Or use our online order form. You can fill this page out right from your browser, then click on the "print button" and postal mail the form to MiracleSoap, Inc. with your form of payment.

  6. Changes to Security. This Security Policy was last changed on March 1, 2005. Miraclesoap.com reserves the right to modify or amend this policy at any time by posting the revised Security Policy on our site. The changes will only affect the information we collect after the effective date of the change to our Security Policy unless we clearly express otherwise.
